Text: Muchow blamed the current $49.8 million budget shortfall on a 50 percent drop in coal exports, a 48 percent drop in natural gas prices and the loss of 4,000 gas pipeline construction jobs.
Cause: Muchow blamed the current $49.8 million budget shortfall
Effect: a 50 percent drop in coal exports, a 48 percent drop in natural gas prices and the loss of 4,000 gas pipeline construction jobs.
Sentence: <e1>Muchow blamed the current $49.8 million budget shortfall</e1> on <e2>a 50 percent drop in coal exports, a 48 percent drop in natural gas prices and the loss of 4,000 gas pipeline construction jobs.</e2>
